程序包 com.group_91.utils

类 Jsons

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group_91.utils.Jsons
  • public class Jsons
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines tools for handling JSON file I/O.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getJSONArray

        public static com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONArray getJSONArray​(java.lang.String name)
        Get info from a particular json file.
        参数:
        name - json file's name. Example: name = "customers" for customers.json
        返回:
        JSONArray

      • getJSONFileSize

        public static int getJSONFileSize​(java.lang.String name)
        Get a particular json file size (how many Objects in the JSONArray).
        参数:
        name - json file's name.
        返回:
        the size of a json file.

      • saveJson

        public static void saveJson​(java.lang.Object jsonObject,
                            java.lang.String name)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Save a JSONObject into a json file.
        参数:
        jsonObject - the JSONObject to be saved.
        name - indicates which json file to be saved.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if failed to load json files.

      • saveJson

        public static void saveJson​(com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONArray jsonArray,
                            java.lang.String name)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Save a new JSONArray into a JSON file. Will delete the original contents.
        参数:
        jsonArray - a JSONArray to be saved.
        name - json file's name.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - for not-found file.

      • update

        public static boolean update​(com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject jsonObject,
                             java.lang.String originalID,
                             java.lang.String idName,
                             java.lang.String fileName)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Update one tuple in a json file. Locate the tuple by id.

        Example: updateJSONObjectInFile(newCustomer, "CUST000001", "customerID", "customers") is used to update the "CUST000001" tuple in customers.json with newCustomer.

        CANNOT MODIFY jsonObject ID!!!!
        参数:
        jsonObject - The JSONObject to be updated.
        originalID - Used to find the specific tuple.
        idName - The name of id in the json file.
        fileName - json file's name.
        返回:
        true if successfully updated.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - for not-found file.
